name: Charles, Emarah KittyCat pops balloons
description:
You are a cat in space...who really hates all the heart balloons clogging up the space. Your mission is to pop them all!

NOTE: Check the sound settings in the game first to check if your sound is on, or is at  a volume you like. 

NOTE: Shooting is CTRL or left click

I had trouble implementing the sound in Web Gl, it seems to be working now though. As a precaution, I will upload a video of my game play for the sound demonstration. 

For best game play, please enter full screen mode.
